reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The project aims to support the establishment of well-functioning and democratic public institutions economic development that contributes to reducing unemployment and raising income levels and the overall promotion of human rights in Namibia- To promote a better understanding of the tenets of democracy throughout Namibia- To encourage participation in national debates on policy issues through the creation of a variety of forums specifically involving women lawmakers- To create greater awareness and discour se among the general public about the role of parliament- To enable stakeholders to have a better understanding of the legislation and other issues before parliament state of national economy and in so doing to raise the quality of public and parliamentary discourseTo monitor the performance of parliament in terms of its capacity to deliver legislation as well as its functioning in terms of its committee systems; accountability and sound administration.

The project aims to support the establishment of well-functioning and democratic public institutions economic development that contributes to reducing unemployment and raising income levels and the overall promotion of human rights in Namibia- To promote a better understanding of the tenets of democracy throughout Namibia- To encourage participation in national debates on policy issues through the creation of a variety of forums specifically involving women lawmakers- To create greater awareness and discour se among the general public about the role of parliament- To enable stakeholders to have a better understanding of the legislation and other issues before parliament state of national economy and in so doing to raise the quality of public and parliamentary discourseTo monitor the performance of parliament in terms of its capacity to deliver legislation as well as its functioning in terms of its committee systems; accountability and sound administration.
